slide.title: Deploying MondoRegex
slide.example:
$ pear package-validate Validation: 0 error(s), 0 warning(s)
$ pear package Analyzing MondoRegex.php Package /path/to/my/devel/dir/MondoRegex-0.1.0.tgz done
$ pear install MondoRegex-0.1.0.tgz install ok: MondoRegex 0.1.0
$ php -f test.php TESTING MondoRegex Using match ...
$ cp MondoRegex-0.1.0.tgz /path/to/my/server/dir/packages/
